text:
vAsaqH sarvA#BirEqvaina#M dEqvatA#BiqH sama#d^^rdhayati paqSavOq vai sOma#H prAqNAyaq tvEtyupa# nahyati prAqNamEqva paqSuShu# dadhAti vyAqnAyaq tvEtyanu# SRunthati vyAqnamEqva paqSuShu# dadhAtiq tasmA$th svaqpanta#M prAqNA na ja#hati || 65
(ita#raM - paSuqmAnth syA$d - yAqtyana#sOq - thsarga#M - tUqShNI(gm) - sa#rvadEvaqtya#M ~Mvai - traya#stri(gm)Sacca) (A9)
